item.title: Eliminating Data Loss in AWS Serverless Architectures with the Outbox Pattern
item.description: As organizations continue to migrate their applications to the cloud, serverless architectures have become increasingly popular due to their scalability, cost-effectiveness, and ease of deployment. However, with the benefits of serverless comes the challenge of ensuring data consistency and minimizing data loss. One solution to this challenge is the Outbox Pattern. This pattern ensures that any changes made to the system are recorded in a reliable data store, making it possible to recover data in the event of an outage.
